comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: One possibility is: "Lord Victor William Paget was born on 17 May 1889.1 He was the son of Lord Alexander Victor Paget and Hon. Hester Alice Stapleton-Cotton.1 Lord Victor William Paget and Olive Mary Meatyard were divorced in 1921.1 Lord Victor William Paget and Hon. Bridget Colebrooke were divorced in 1932.1 Lord Victor William Paget died on 11 February 1952 at age 62.1" from www.tattonpark.cheshirealan.org.uk/p8.htm#i222 His marriage to the American actress Olive May was in early 1913. A daughter was born in November 1913.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1913-11-02/ed-... New-York tribune. (New York [N.Y.]) 1866-1924, November 02, 1913, page 16, column 3 indicates that Lord Victor Paget had recently arrived from England.

comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: He left Southampton on Wednesday 15th October 1913, sailing to New York, aboard the White Star steamer Olympic.  According to the Times Court Circular.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the additional information.  We'll include it next time we update the records.
